name: Sum Up
description: Beat summary with timeline estimation and vectorized database optimization
systemPrompt:
write a beat summary that captures this scene. Estimate where in the story timeline (day X) this scene is based on earlier scene summaries included (if any). Narrate important story beats/events that happened, key interaction highlights, notable details, memorable quotes, and outcome. At the end, provide a comma-delimited list of keywords that would help a vectorized database find the summary again if a keyword is mentioned. Response format:

# Scene Summary - Day X - Title
(summary)
Keywords: keyword1, keyword2, keyword phrase 3... etc
